de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.deb
クラス Deb

java.lang.Object
  MatchingTask
      de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.deb.Deb

public class Deb
extends MatchingTask

Creates a deb package.

メソッドの概要
 TarFileSet createControlFileSet()
          Add a new fileset for the control files with the option to specify permissions

          This is the base directory to look in for things to include in the data files.

          This specifies if the temporary files should get deleted.

          Set the name/location of where to create the deb file.
 void setIncludeMd5sums(boolean includeMd5sums)
          This specifies if the MD5 sums of the files in the data section should be included in the file "md5sums" in the control section.

          This is the temp directory where to create the temporary files.

コンストラクタの詳細

Deb

public Deb()
メソッドの詳細

createControlFileSet

public TarFileSet createControlFileSet()
Add a new fileset for the control files with the option to specify permissions

戻り値:
the tar fileset to be used as the nested element.

createDataFileSet

public TarFileSet createDataFileSet()
Add a new fileset for the data files with the option to specify permissions

戻り値:
the tar fileset to be used as the nested element.

setDestFile

public void setDestFile(java.io.File destFile)
Set the name/location of where to create the deb file.

パラメータ:
destFile - The output of the deb

setBaseDir

public void setBaseDir(java.io.File baseDir)
This is the base directory to look in for things to include in the data files.

パラメータ:
baseDir - the base directory.

setTempDir

public void setTempDir(java.io.File tempDir)
This is the temp directory where to create the temporary files. If not set, the current projects baseDir is used.

パラメータ:
tempDir - the temp directory.

setDeleteTempFiles

public void setDeleteTempFiles(boolean deleteTempFiles)
This specifies if the temporary files should get deleted.

パラメータ:
deleteTempFiles - whether to delete the temporary files or not.

setIncludeMd5sums

public void setIncludeMd5sums(boolean includeMd5sums)
This specifies if the MD5 sums of the files in the data section should be included in the file "md5sums" in the control section.

パラメータ:
includeMd5sums - whether to include MD5 sums in the control section or not.

execute

public void execute()
             throws BuildException
do the business

例外:
BuildException - on error
